greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1, a(2n) = nthcomposite(a(n)-1), a(2n+1) = nthprime(a(n)), where nthcomposite = A002808, nthprime = A000040.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller (terms 0-300) & Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4095
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(0) = 1, a(2n) = nthcomposite(a(n)-1), a(2n+1) = nthprime(a(n)), where nthcomposite = A002808, nthprime = A000040. - _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 04 2015
program: A002808(n) = { my(k=-1); while( -n + n += -k + k=primepi(n), ); n }; \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_
xref: Compare also to the permutation A246378.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 30 2014
ext: Name replaced by an explicit recurrence. - _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 04 2015
